import React from 'react'; import { GameUIProps } from '../../types.ts'; import './GameUI.css'; const GameUI: React.FC = ({ killCount, buffTimerValue, soundBtnLabelOn, onSoundToggle, onStopGame }) => { return ( <>
Kills: {killCount}
Control: WASD
Shoot: LM
{buffTimerValue ? (
Buff: {buffTimerValue}
) : null}
); }; export default GameUI;
